metadata.title: Commands: Resource
metadata.description: The `consul resource` command interacts with Consul's v2 catalog of services and its resources. It exposes top-level commands for reading and filtering data from the registry.

metadata.title: Consul by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Consul is a service networking solution to automate network configurations, discover services, and enable secure connectivity across any cloud or runtime.
